name: Victor Symonds

projects.title: Peiix - Peiix Master
projects.description: Lead QA for a mobile application that allows Peiix Master users to access and view information about their terminals and associated transactions.

projects.title: LTC Logistics - AIISTA
projects.description: QA for a program developed to simulate an existing shipping route and to simulate events that affect the travel time or the condition of the truck.

projects.title: Encora - SIPO
projects.description: Frontend Developer for a digital platform developed for Encora Inc. to improve the assignment and management of clients, projects, vacancies, and employees, enhancing resource visibility and optimizing time and effort.

projects.title: Entiénde[me]
projects.description: Developer for an AI-based system that uses graphology and computer vision to analyze handwritten text captured by a camera, detect emotions such as happiness or sadness, and generate an AI-generated image that symbolizes the detected emotion

services.title: QA Engineering
services.description: I create and execute test cases, performing manual testing (API/UI), reporting bugs, and ensuring product quality

services.title: Software Test Engineering
services.description: I develop and execute and implement automated test scripts, and validate software functionality and performance across multiple environments

services.title: Web Design
services.description: I design and create visually appealing websites with a focus on responsive design

services.title: Machine Learning
services.description: I develop and implement machine learning models for tasks such as image generation, natural language processing, and data prediction.

aboutpara: Born in Hermosillo, Sonora, Mexico, I developed an interest in computers from a young age and began programming simple projects in elementary school. In middle school, I created a booth capable of measuring a person’s height and weight just by stepping inside. Since then, I’ve continued to grow my programming skills and I’m constantly learning new things every day.

resume.tagline: I'm a software developer and QA engineer
resume.description: I have a current preference in the software test engineering and QA

education.universityPara: I studied at the Sonora Norte Campus
